# Context

Working with your onboarding buddy will be structured around one more more onboarding projects. These will be your first projects with the team.

# Project Expectations

-   Learning and collaboration will be the primary focus of these projects

-   This sets the context to explore the team's projects and how we work

-   Your work will not be evaluated based on any sort of performance, grade, or expected level of impact

-   We want these projects to be an enjoyable way for your to ease yourself into our community
